title: The Armies of France and Burgundy with Martel in Prayer
description: The Armies of France and Burgundy with Martel in Prayer; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Written: Brussels, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 22.9 x 19.4 cm (9 x 7 5/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 4; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
